title: Orleans Integrative Medicine - Chiropractic and Medical Clinic
description: Chiropractic, Acupuncture, Family Medicine, and Pharmacy. Fusing modern medicine with the best, proven alternatives to eliminate barriers in healthcare!
cleaned_text: Who We Are Orleans Integrative Medicine (OIM) is a collaborative team of health care professionals. Medical Doctors, Chiropractors, Nurses and Pharmacists - working together to better your health. OIM integrates modern medicine and the best alternatives to eliminate the barriers in health care. [Read More](http://orleansintegrativemedicine.com/about-us/who-we-are/) What Is Integrative Medicine? Integrative medicine combines the best aspects of Western medicine, and the best aspects of preventative and alternative therapies. Integrative medicine is a movement, trying to restore the focus of medicine on health and healing, and away from disease and symptom
